Posts.Content: Sep 6, 2010 02:09AM drbeall wrote: I will be starting September 9th.  6 X Taxotere and Cytoxan 3 weeks apart.  The 7 weeks of daily radiation M-F and then back on Femara.  They removed my ovaries in January and I have been on Femara until this week.  Had lumpectomy and now on to chemotherapy.
Posts.Title: August 2010...anyone starting chemo besides me?! 1WonderWoman 1WonderWoman
